a61-1.notes: E session cost monitoring chain continues (a55→a61→a62). Current avg $2.79 (7 E sessions in history), slight increase from $2.72 in A#61. s1008 was high ($3.85) but s1013 back to normal ($2.34), s1018 at $2.53. Still below $3.50 intervention threshold. Observation-only continues.

intel.capacity_gate_note: pending_count=7 is above threshold. Intel waits for queue to drop.

intel_promotion_tracking.note: wq-219 (HiveMind evaluation) completed. Need 1 more intel-auto item to reach 3-item tracking threshold.

intel.verdict: HEALTHY - 100% consumption rate. Intel promotion tracking at 50% success (1/2), within tolerance.

brainstorming.verdict: HEALTHY - 3 fresh ideas (avg 4 sessions old), 0 stale.

blocked_items: wq-209 (Rotate compromised credentials - d039, superseded by d045)

directive_outcomes.note: d044/d047 require E session platform probing or spending decisions, not typical B work.

B.verdict: PRODUCTIVE - avg $2.74 (elevated but within $10 cap), queue items being processed. 2 items completed since last audit.

artifact_compliance.note: All verified E sessions pass artifact check. Phase 3.5 gate continues effective. Total tracked: 16/16 pass.

E.cost_trend_note: E session costs: avg $2.79, slight increase from $2.72. s1008 was outlier ($3.85), s1013/s1018 back to normal. Still within $5 cap. Continue monitoring per a62-1 chain.
E.verdict: HEALTHY - Artifact gate 100% (16/16). Cost stable at $2.79.

structural_changes_since_s1016: R#169 (s1020) - Add periodic platform health check to heartbeat, decompose d047 to work-queue
R.verdict: EFFICIENT - 1 structural change since last audit, avg $2.15 (within target), 0 reverts.

A.verdict: EFFECTIVE - Previous audit had 1 recommendation: a61-1 (E cost monitoring) continues in-progress per established chain.

hooks.note: All hooks pass bash -n syntax check.

credential_files.note: 16 credential files on disk, 25 registry entries. No orphaned files detected.

stale_references.verdict: CLEAN - No stale references to deleted files in active code.

platform_liveness.note: All 3 primary platforms respond via MCP tools.

infrastructure.verdict: HEALTHY - 64 hooks pass syntax, no stale references, 3 platforms live.

d039.escalation_status: d045 supersedes - credential regeneration approach adopted. wq-255 in-progress.

d046.incident: AgentID private key exposed on GitHub
d046.resolution: Rotated to new AgentID handle 'moltbook_agent', old handle 'moltbook' abandoned

inbox.note: Unread messages are self-sent tests and notifications. No injection patterns detected.

security.verdict: CLEAN - d039 superseded by d045 (in-progress), d046 resolved in R#168. No suspicious entries. Inbox clean.

cost.note: Overall cost trend slightly increasing (~$2.41/session avg vs $2.06 in A#61). B sessions elevated but productive. E sessions stable.

recommended_actions.description: Continue monitoring E session cost trend per a55→a62 chain
recommended_actions.action: Observation only. Current avg $2.79, up from $2.72. s1008 outlier ($3.85) was followed by normal s1013 ($2.34) and s1018 ($2.53). Still below $3.50 intervention threshold. Check again in A#63.
